content:
Can someone please take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76971? Simple change that closes an issue by enabling a piece of code to be optimized. Thanks!

I hate to bug people for reviews, but I'm afraid it will get buried :smile:
you can always bug us in #t-release/triage we can take care of it :smile:

@Dániel Buga looking at it, we normally give the reviewer some time (1-2 weeks) to review prs, so to be fair to them and the other pending reviews, i'll wait for a few days and ping/re-assign if necessary unless some other member reviews it on their own. Thanks

Thank you, I'll do that next time. I didn't want to be impatient or anything, I just thought the patch was trivial enough. Anyway, I was wrong and now I have some work to do.

I'll be more considerate next time.
it's fine, it's just that the reviewer may have not seen it yet.
